channel.title: Hello all
channel.description:
It's Gliomaru here ;) just checking on all you private server coders. I am wondering where you guys are at right now.
Is your servers updateable?
Do you have the new dragons and demons in? New area updates?
If so I would like to have a link to whatever client and source allows this, so I have something rather to play around with.
It would be greatly appriciated. ;)

item.title: Hello all
